allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix 404 error by updating to v1beta API and gemini-1.5-flash-latest

- Changed API endpoint from v1 to v1beta \(required for Flash models\)
- Updated model from gemini-1.5-flash to gemini-1.5-flash-latest
- Added listAvailableModels\(\) debug utility to check accessible models
- Updated AI_SETUP_GUIDE.md with correct model information
- Enhanced README.md with AI integration details and debugging info
- No npm packages required - uses REST API directly

The v1 API only supports legacy models, causing 404 errors.
v1beta is required for all newer Flash and Pro models.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Replace Google Gemini API with local browser-based AI \(Transformers.js\)

- Integrated Transformers.js library for 100% local AI processing
- No API key required - AI runs entirely in browser
- Uses Xenova/distilbart-cnn-6-6 model \(optimized for browsers\)
- Auto-initializes AI model on page load
- Supports summarization and question answering
- Fallback to keyword matching if AI fails
- First-time model download ~50MB, cached for future use
- Completely free and private - no external API calls

Benefits:
- No quota limits or rate limiting
- No API costs
- Complete privacy \(data never leaves browser\)
- Works offline after initial model download
- No authentication setup needed

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
